phrases: The people who made my life fuller.
The people who called me back to the stage...
I... I cannot let them down.
This is the sound that my mother gave me.
The sound that Watari made me notice.
The sound that Tsubaki found for me.
The sound that was born out of my battles with Aiza and Igawa-san.
The sound that Aiza-san and I created together.
The sound that Hiroko-san made me remember.
It is just like you said.
I am overflowing with so many sounds.
From the moment that we meet someone else, none of us can ever be alone.
Do not leave me all alone!
No way am I going to leave you all alone.
I am piling on everything I have...
Just kick your illness to the curb!
And then, one more time, we will...
Call me to kill time again!
I do not care if I am just Friend A...
Please do not leave me behind!
If you do not mind, please take this.
For making Kaori's life such a full one.
It feels weird to be writing a letter to someone who was just with me a moment ago.
The first time I ever saw you was when I was five...
It was during the recital for the piano school I was going to back then.
The boy who appeared so awkwardly drove the audience to laughter
when he bumped his behind on the stool...
He sat before the piano that was too big for him,
and the moment he played that first note...
He became the object of my admiration.
Playing notes as colorful as a 24-color palette, the melody began to dance.
I was totally surprised when the kid next to me burst out crying.
And yet, you are going to quit playing the piano.
After influencing my life the way you did...
I am going to quit piano and play the violin!
What is this all of a sudden?
I want Kousei to play the piano for me!
When I found out that we were going to the same junior high, I was elated.
How could I find a way to talk to you?
Maybe I will go buy sandwiches everyday?
But in the end, all I could do was watch you.
After all, you guys were all too tight.
There was no space for me to slip into.
I had surgery as a child, and then got treated regularly as an outpatient.
After I collapsed in seventh grade, I was in and out of the hospital, repeatedly.
I started spending more time in than out.
I was hardly ever in school by then.
I knew that I was not very well.
When I saw my mother and father crying in the hospital waiting room,
I realized that I did not have much time.
I started doing whatever I wanted, so I would not bring my regrets with me to heaven.
Those contact lenses that scared the heck out of me.
Eating a whole cake, which I would never done before because I worried about my weight.
Even the music scores that bossed me around so haughtily...
I just told a single lie.
There is something I want to tell you.
Please tell Watari-kun that I am sorry.
Go to hell, you miserable cheater!
All I did was go out with some girl!
You should have gone with me the day before yesterday!
I guess it will not take long for Watari-kun to forget all about me.
As a friend, he is a fun guy, but I would rather have someone more intense.
Please tell Tsubaki-chan that I am sorry.
I am just someone who is passing through, who will be gone.
I did not want to leave an awkward mess behind, so I could not ask Tsubaki-chan.
Or rather, even if I asked her straight-up, Please introduce me to Arima-kun,
I do not think Tsubaki-chan would have been okay with that.
After all, Tsubaki-chan was so crazy about you.
We would all known that for a long time.
The only ones who did not know were you...
Go check on Kousei, will you?
Ask him if he is eating right.
Now that the person he was in love with is gone, I just know that he is feeling down.
I just do not know what I should do for him...
You are such a dummy, it would not do any good to rack the brains that you do not even have!
Do not you think that is a little too harsh?
I do not think it has to be anything special.
It is all right to just be yourself, I bet.
At times like these, you do not listen to your head...
Where did you get that perspective on romance?
Nao Kashiwagi 15 years old Has not had a boyfriend yet Book Collection: 108
The you that my underhanded lie brought to me
was not who I would imagined.
You were more negative and passive than I thought,
not to mention stubborn, relentless, and a camera voyeur.
Your voice was lower than I thought, and you were more manly than I thought.
And you were... just as gentle as I thought.
The river was so cold and felt so good when we jumped off Courage Bridge, was not it?
The round moon peeking into the music room looked like a delicious manju bun.
When we raced that train, I really thought that we could win.
It was fun singing Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star together under the shining stars, was not it?
There is just something about school at night, right?
Do not you think snow looks just like cherry blossom petals?
To be so consumed by everything off-stage when I am a musician...
Look how you have gotten more sensual.
You have grown up, have not you?
N-N-N-Not like I want to be able to play just like Mr. Arima, all right?
Is not it funny how the most unforgettable scenes can be so trivial?
Was I able to live inside someone is heart?
Was I able to live inside your heart?
You barged right in without taking off your shoes.
Do you think you will remember me at least a little?
You would better not hit reset!
I am glad it is you, after all.
I hope I can reach you.
Sorry I did not finish all the caneles.
Sorry I hit you so much.
Sorry I was such a brat.
I am the one who should be thanking you.
P.S. I am enclosing something that I have always treasured.
If you do not want it, feel free to tear it up and throw it away.
What do you think you are doing!?
Do not go thinking you can ever be alone, Kousei!
I am going to stay with you forever and ever, like your guardian angel!
Spring, the season I met you, is coming.
